Been away from Twitter for awhile working 200+ hours a paycheck for past several months to fund my most important decision, yet.

The journey has begun. https://t.co/P0jAdERL1h

Texas is a blue state when you strip away the voter suppression and gerrymandering, but this election cycle we’re going to show the country that even with those obstacles, we’re still anything but solidly red.

Today’s the day!

If you’re in Texas (especially TX-21 because I’m a bit biased) make sure to get to the polls! Today is the true start of the blue wave in Texas, and we’re gonna make it a big one.
A college education shouldn’t come with decades of debt.
Healthcare isn’t something that people should be unable to afford and obtain.
We have a responsibility to future generations to save our planet from destruction. If we don’t, it’s them who suffer. We can’t let that happen.
Hate to break it to Conservatives, but your views on abortion don’t actually justify stripping millions of people if their right to bodily autonomy.

Conservatives claim to be working class while simultaneously opposing basically any legislation that helps working families because they’re corporate sellouts with no actual plan to help anyone but themselves and their donors.
Conservatives aren’t actually pro-small government, they’re just pro-slashing programs that help poor people.
Saving the planet is worth every penny, because it’s destruction is infinitely more expensive than any solution could ever be.

We’re in the final stretch of this primary and need your support to ensure we have what we need to win, and then square off against our district’s incompetent Conservative incumbent.

Donate today, and help us cross the finish line.
